abstract: HSBC Holdings may put part of the 12.5 billion pounds ($17.7 billion) it plans to raise through a rights offering toward some dealmaking in Asia and other emerging markets.
lead_paragraph: HSBC Holdings may put part of the 12.5 billion pounds ($17.7 billion) it plans to raise through a rights offering toward some dealmaking in Asia and other emerging markets.

headline.main: HSBC May Use Fresh Funds for Takeovers
